content.text: I'm a night owl too, but I'm an extrovert so I'm always out and about.
I used to be an extrovert, but then I realized I'm not very good at it.
What do you mean by that?
Well, I always feel like I'm being judged by people, and I get really nervous when I have to talk to people I don't know.
I know what you mean. I used to be the same way. But then I realized that everyone is just as nervous as I am, and that helped me to relax a little bit.
That's a good point. I'll try to remember that next time I'm in a social situation.
Good luck!
Thanks!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the park with my dog, George. We play fetch and I just enjoy spending time with him.
That sounds really nice. I don't have a dog, but I love animals.
Me too! I have always loved animals.
What kind of animals do you like the most?
I love dogs, cats, and horses. I think they're all so cute and cuddly.
Me too! I love dogs the most, but I also love cats. I've never had a horse, but I've always wanted one.
Horses are amazing animals. They're so strong and beautiful.
I know! I've always wanted to go horseback riding.
You should definitely do it! It's a lot of fun.
I will! I'm going to have to find a place that offers lessons.
There are a lot of places that offer lessons. Just do a Google search and you'll be sure to find something.
Thanks for the tip!
No problem
